summary: Crossbow fire and Bolt Impact Sound Replace.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=8][color=#77582a][b]Realistic Crossbow Fire[/b][/color][/size]

This MOD allows you to change the sound effect of a bolt that was emitted from the crossbow.[/center]


[heading][size=6][color=#77582a]Required DLC[/color][/size][/heading]
This MOD changes the sound of a crossbow coming up in Dawnguard.
Dawnguard is necessary for use.

[heading][size=6][color=#77582a]Update change log[/color][/size][/heading]
[color=#00cccc]The sound file varies according to an uploaded version each.
Please use the sound file of an old version if dissatisfied with the latest sound.[/color]

[color=#cc0000]Version 1.6[/color]
Changed "Shot and Reload" effect sound.
Deleted "Imploved sound compatibility version" plugin file.

[color=#cc0000]Version 1.5[/color]
I changed some sound and volume

[youtube]xsfdz9ONueE[/youtube]

[color=#cc0000]Version 1.4[/color]
New version allows you to change the sound when the bolt hits in all material.
[color=#cc0000]Version 1.3[/color]
Ice Form Fix and Add Gravel Hit Sound
[color=#cc0000]Version 1.2[/color]
Added Crossbow Reload Sound Replacer
[color=#cc0000]Version 1.1[/color]
I change the sound effect of a bolt that hit the meat.
[color=#cc0000]Version 1.0[/color]
If you have hit the meat, sound of Vanilla is played.

[youtube]ce9ckwER2NU[/youtube]

[heading][size=6][color=#77582a]Install[/color][/size][/heading]
This MOD can be installed in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1840/?]Wrye Bash[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/?]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]Mod Organizer[/url].
If you want to install manually, please install the all files to your "Data" folder.

[heading][size=6][color=#77582a]Uninstall[/color][/size][/heading]
This MOD uninstalls using tools as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/?]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1840/?]Wrye Bash[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]Mod Organizer[/url].
author: tanishin
